actions.text: Amendment SA 1510 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 1510 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 1463. (consideration: CR S3912-3915; text: CR S3913) To require a report on the interoperability between electronic health records systems of the Department of Defense and the Department of Veterans Affairs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1510 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1510 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Heller to Amendment SA 1463.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To require a report on the interoperability between electronic health records systems of the Department of Defense and the Department of Veterans Affairs.
